languages.text: "Хальбрандт, ты действуй по изначальному плану! Бери двух братьев и отправляйся за Криком скверны. Разведка доносит, что, потерпев поражение в битве на подступах к Машинному храму, он укрылся здесь, в его недрах. Я хочу привезти на Фенрис нечестивую жестянку, в которой запаян его предательский мозг. Славной охоты!"

"Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Doomscream. Our scouts report that he took refuge here in these depths after being defeated in battle on the approach to the Machine Cathedral. I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"
languages.original_text: "Хальбрандт, ты действуй по изначальному плану! Бери двух братьев и отправляйся за Криком скверны. Разведка доносит, что, потерпев поражение в битве на подступах к Машинному храму, он укрылся здесь, в его недрах. Я хочу привезти на Фенрис нечестивую жестянку, в которой запаян его предательский мозг. Славной охоты!"

I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"
"Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Balescream. I want to take the unholy can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

languages.text: “哈尔布兰特，你按原计划行事！带两个兄弟去找灾啸。咱们的斥候报告说，灾啸在机械大教堂那场战斗中被打败之后，就一直躲在这片区域深处休养生息。我打算把装着叛徒脑袋的臭铁罐子带回芬里斯！狩猎愉快！”
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Doomscream. Our scouts report that he took refuge here in these depths after being defeated in battle on the approach to the Machine Cathedral. I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

traits.locale_text: “哈尔布兰特，你按原计划行事！带两个兄弟去找灾啸，我要把装着叛徒脑袋的臭铁罐子带回芬里斯！狩猎愉快！”

languages.text: « Halbrandt, tiens-t'en au plan d'origine ! Emmène deux frères et mettez-vous aux trousses du Fléau Hurlant. Selon nos éclaireurs, il se serait réfugié dans ces profondeurs après sa défaite lors de l'approche de la Cathédrale de la machine. Je veux pouvoir rapporter sa cervelle de traître sur Fenris. Bonne chasse ! »
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Doomscream. Our scouts report that he took refuge here in these depths after being defeated in battle on the approach to the Machine Cathedral. I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

traits.locale_text: « Halbrandt, tiens-t'en au plan d'origine ! Emmène deux frères et mettez-vous aux trousses du Fléau Hurlant. Je veux pouvoir rapporter sur Fenris sa cervelle de traître sur Fenris. Bonne chasse ! »

languages.text: 「ハルブラント、お前は当初の計画に従え！同胞を2人連れて、ベイルスクリームの後を追え。偵察の報告によれば、ヤツは機械大聖堂に向かう際の戦いに敗れた後、この深みへと身を隠したそうだ。裏切り者の脳みそが詰まった穢れたブリキ缶をフェンリスに持ち帰ってやる。武運を祈るぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Doomscream. Our scouts report that he took refuge here in these depths after being defeated in battle on the approach to the Machine Cathedral. I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

traits.locale_text: 「ハルブラント、お前は当初の計画に従え！同胞を2人連れて、ベイルスクリームの後を追え。裏切り者の脳みそが詰まった穢れたブリキ缶をフェンリスに持ち帰ってやる。武運を祈るぞ！」

languages.text: «Halbrandt, ¡sigue el plan original! Llévate a dos hermanos y dad caza a Balescream. Los exploradores afirman que se ha refugiado en las profundidades tras ser derrotado durante la aproximación a la Catedral Máquina. Quiero llevar la lata maldita que guarda su cerebro traicionero a Fenris. ¡Buena caza!».
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Doomscream. Our scouts report that he took refuge here in these depths after being defeated in battle on the approach to the Machine Cathedral. I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

traits.locale_text: «Halbrandt, ¡sigue el plan original! Llévate a dos hermanos y dad caza a Balescream. Quiero llevar la lata maldita que guarda su cerebro traicionero a Fenris. ¡Buena caza!».

languages.text: "Halbrandt, haltet Euch an den ursprünglichen Plan! Nehmt zwei Brüder und macht Jagd auf Unheilsschrei. Unsere Späher berichten, dass er hier in den Tiefen Zuflucht gesucht hat, nachdem er im Kampf während des Anflugs auf die Maschinenkathedrale besiegt worden war. Ich will diese unheilige Blechbüchse, die sein verräterisches Gehirn beherbergt, zurück nach Fenris bringen. Weidmanns Heil!"
languages.original_text: "Halbrandt, you stick to the original plan! Take two brothers and go after Doomscream. Our scouts report that he took refuge here in these depths after being defeated in battle on the approach to the Machine Cathedral. I want to take the unholy tin can that holds his traitorous brain back to Fenris. Good hunting!"

traits.locale_text: "Halbrandt, haltet Euch an den ursprünglichen Plan! Nehmt zwei Brüder und macht Jagd auf Unheilsschrei. Ich will diese unheilige Blechbüchse, die sein verräterisches Gehirn beherbergt, zurück nach Fenris bringen. Weidmanns Heil!"
